io.micronaut.context.env

Interface PropertySourceLoader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PropertySourceLocator, PropertySourceReader, Toggleable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPropertySourceLoader, CloudFoundryVcapApplicationPropertySourceLoader, CloudFoundryVcapServicesPropertySourceLoader, EnvJsonPropertySourceLoader, JsonPropertySourceLoader, PropertiesPropertySourceLoader, YamlPropertySourceLoader

    public interface PropertySourceLoader
extends Toggleable, PropertySourceLocator, PropertySourceReader
    Loads the given property source for the given environment.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
